title: A Testimony from the people of God call'd Quakers, against false reports at our monthly meeting in York, the sixth day of the second month call'd Aprill, 1694.
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).

Signed at end: John Taylor, Thomas Waite, John Todd, Robert Jeeb, Benjamin Brown, Edward Moore, John Webster, Zacheus Canby, Michaell Lazenby, Thomas Hammond, Robert Hillary, WIlliam Tuke, Mathew Hargrave.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
